toys.name: Remote Control Race Car
toys.description: Experience high-speed racing with this remote control race car. It comes with responsive controls and a sleek design.

toys.name: Construction Vehicle Set
toys.description: Let your child explore construction play with this set of toy vehicles. It includes a dump truck, bulldozer, and excavator.

toys.name: Remote Control Helicopter
toys.description: Take to the skies with this remote control helicopter. It features gyroscopic stabilization for smooth flights.

toys.name: Rescue Helicopter Playset
toys.description: Let your child play the hero with this rescue helicopter playset. It includes a helicopter, figures, and rescue accessories.

toys.name: Remote Control Excavator
toys.description: Bring the construction site to life with this remote control excavator. It features realistic digging and sound effects.

toys.name: Sand and Dig Excavator
toys.description: Let your child dig, scoop, and play with this sand and dig excavator. Perfect for outdoor adventures.
